backend/main.mo: Defines core actor logic with user profiles, slots, gigs, transactions, ROI data, and comparison helpers, integrating authorization and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature implementation evidence referencing frontend files, components, and test IDs for tracking, admin dashboard, navigation, and analytics.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of major frontend components, pages, hooks, and styles for documentation or analysis.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light/dark mode with custom OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling auth, profile loading, minimal routing including /admin, and automatic page-view tracking.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI screen shown when a non-admin user attempts to access restricted admin pages.
frontend/src/components/AvailabilityCale: Musician availability calendar allowing slot creation and availability toggling with sorted display.
frontend/src/components/BookingDialog.ts: Dialog for venues to book a musician by submitting event name, date, and price, then calling the bookGig mutation.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar showing branding, user avatar menu, admin link, and logout handling using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/MusicianSearch.t: Search UI that filters musicians by name, location, or bio and displays cards with booking actions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form for new users to create and save a profile including name, phone, location, bio, and role selection.
Dialog with live camera scanning to validate musician QR tickets and verify gig attendance.
frontend/src/components/QRTicketGenerato: Generates and downloads simple QR-code-like images for each confirmed gig using a custom canvas renderer.
frontend/src/components/WalletView.tsx: Displays wallet totals and breakdown of locked, available, and paid funds using styled cards.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading, login, logout, and identity management for the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating profiles, musicians, gigs, analytics, and usage events via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUsageTracking.ts: Tracks session start, page views, and user actions by recording usage events when authenticated.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles, CSS variables for light/dark themes, and base typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, InternetIdentityProvider, and React Query client.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Renders analytics dashboard showing KPIs and usage events with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerDashboard.tsx: Displays customer-facing event search and upcoming gigs using user profile and gig data.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page with login buttons, hero section, search, and a preview of upcoming gigs.
frontend/src/pages/MusicianDashboard.tsx: Dashboard for musicians showing upcoming gigs, earnings, availability, and related management tools.
frontend/src/pages/VenueDashboard.tsx: Dashboard for venues with gig stats, musician search, booking, and QR-based verification tools.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and enabling typography and query plugins.
project_state.json: JSON file describing current project state, including schema version, app analytics goals, admin dashboard requirements, existing features, and pending feature requests. It also lists architectural notes and known implementation issues.
